faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform
faq.stillHaveQuestions: Still have questions? Don't hesitate to reach out to us.

pricing.question: What are the subscription costs?
pricing.answer: We don't charge any upfront fees. Our subscription plans start at $9/month for basic features, with options to upgrade for more advanced tools and coaching connections.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You will continue to have access to your plan until the end of your billing cycle.

coaches.question: How do I find a coach?
coaches.answer: You can browse through our list of certified coaches, filter by specialty, and read reviews from other users to find the perfect match for your fitness goals.

tracking.question: How does the tracking feature work?
tracking.answer: Our platform allows you to track your steps, calories burned, and workouts in real-time. You can set goals and receive reminders to keep you on track.

coaching.question: How do I connect with a coach?
coaching.answer: Once you find a coach you like, you can subscribe to their package. This will give you access to their coaching services and personalized plans.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer?
support.answer: We provide 24/7 customer support through chat and email. Our team is here to help you with any questions or issues you may have.

testimonials.title: Coaches Love Our Platform
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from fitness professionals who have transformed their coaching business

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about coaching on our platform

pricing.question: How much does it cost to use the platform?
pricing.answer: There's no upfront cost to join. We take a 10% commission on subscriptions you sell through the platform. No monthly fees, no hidden charges.

start.question: How quickly can I start earning?
start.answer: You can set up your profile and subscription packages in less than 30 minutes. Once approved, you can start inviting clients and earning immediately.

payout.question: When and how do I get paid?
payout.answer: We process payouts every week for all subscription revenue. You can choose to receive payments via direct deposit, PayPal, or Stripe.

requirements.question: What qualifications do I need to become a coach?
requirements.answer: While we don't require specific certifications, we do review all coach applications. Having recognized fitness certifications will help your application and build client trust.

support.question: What kind of support do you offer to coaches?
support.answer: We provide 24/7 technical support, a comprehensive knowledge base, and regular webinars on how to maximize your coaching business. Plus, you'll join our community of fitness professionals.

clients.question: Can I bring my existing clients to the platform?
clients.answer: Absolutely! We make it easy to invite your existing clients. You'll also have the opportunity to be discovered by new clients searching for coaches on our platform.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption and security protocols to protect your information and your clients' data.

cta.title: Take your training business to the next level
